name: capacity-team-planner
description: Capacity Team Planner - Planowanie pojemności zespołu z Jira i Tempo

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-prebuild: echo '=== Heroku Prebuild ===' && pwd && ls -la && if [ -d frontend ]; then echo 'Frontend dir exists' && cd frontend && npm install; else echo 'Frontend dir not found'; fi
scripts.heroku-postbuild: echo '=== Heroku Postbuild ===' && pwd && ls -la && if [ -d frontend ]; then echo 'Building frontend...' && cd frontend && npm run build && echo '=== Build completed ===' && ls -la build/; else echo 'Frontend dir not found, skipping build'; fi
